Song.title: The Name Above All Names
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Judah Groveman © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [||: F#m D2 | C#m7 E | Bm E | F#m :||]
VERSE 1: Great Cre[F#m]ator [D] of the [C#m]heavens and the [E]earth You know [Bm]every [E]star by [F#m]name Awesome [F#m]power [D] is re[C#m]vealed{,} in all Your [E]works And for[Bm]ever [E]You will [F#m]reign
VERSE 2: Righteous [F#m]Sovereign [D] over [C#m]history and [E]time Wholly [Bm]God yet [E]fully [F#m]man What a [F#m]mystery{,} [D] that You [C#m]left Your throne on [E]high To re[Bm]turn with [E]nail-scarred [F#m]hands
Pre-Chorus: And [D]one day every [E]knee will humbly [F#m]bow [| E] And [Bm]every tongue con[C#m]fess aloud that
CHORUS: [A]Jesus is the [D]name above all names He is [F#m]worthy o[E]f all pr[D]aise [A]Jesus is the [D]name above all names King of [F#m]kings for [E]endless [D]days
VERSE 3: Perfect [F#m]wisdom [D] in the [C#m]mercy of the [E]Cross Still I’ll [Bm]never [E]under[F#m]stand Why a [F#m]rebel [D] so un[C#m]worthy of such [E]cost Would be [Bm]ransomed [E]by your [F#m]hand [(to pre-chorus)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 great creator of the heavens and the earth you know every star by name awesome power is revealed in all your works and forever you will reign verse 2 righteous sovereign over history and time wholly god yet fully man what a mystery that you left your throne on high to return with nailscarred hands prechorus and one day every knee will humbly bow and every tongue confess aloud that chorus jesus is the name above all names he is worthy of all praise jesus is the name above all names king of kings for endless days verse 3 perfect wisdom in the mercy of the cross still ill never understand why a rebel so unworthy of such cost would be ransomed by your hand
